item.title: Graffiti on bus shelter by Crossway/Petts Wood Road, 27th July
item.description:
The graffiti remains weeks after reporting the matter. Someone should remove it. The panels have now been smashed and it looks really bad-no care. Rubbish is left there constantly as no bins are provided. Remove the shelter if you are not looking after it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Petts Wood Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Graffiti / Flyposting on stop or shelter (non-offensive)

item.title: Road Bin Collection, 27th July
item.description:
Can you please advise me when the bin on Whiston Road will next be collected? Https://maps.app.goo.gl/HEAVZ8WeTtnSPwMc9 Someone has put a device with presumably a low battery in it and it's going off continuously; which is infuriating although I appreci
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Whiston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Near bus stop 11996 on Gloucester Avenue, 27th July
item.description:
It is covering the bus flag which is causing inconvenience to TFL when closing the bus stop and unable to hood stop which is giving customers incorrect information

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Avenue, Chalk Farm, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass re bus shelter, 27th July
item.description:
The bus shelter has broken glass panels and the pavement in front is full of glass. This is very dangerous for little children walking by or dogs on walks. The shelter by Crossway/Petts Wood Road was damaged recently with graffiti and this was reported. I also said if it was left, further damage would occur and this is exactly what has happened.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Petts Wood Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Damage - smashed glass or panels / jagged metal edges on shelter

item.title: Been threatened to get stabbed., 27th July
item.description:
